command.broadcast-tables-cursor: cursor test for select t_province.province_id, t_province.province_name, t_city.city_id, t_city.city_name from t_city, t_province where t_province.province_id = t_city.province_id;
command.broadcast-tables-cursor2: cursor test for select b.province_id, b.province_name, a.city_id, a.city_name, c.country_id from t_city a, t_province b, t_country c where b.province_id = a.province_id and a.country_id in (select country_id from t_country) order by city_id desc;
command.broadcast-and-sharding-tables-cursor: cursor test for select a.address, b.city_name from t_address a, t_city b where b.city_id = a.city_id and a.address_id in (select address_id from t_order);
command.broadcast-and-single-tables-cursor: cursor test for select a.address, b.city_name from t_address a, t_city b where b.city_id = a.city_id and a.address_id in (select address_id from t_product);
command.broadcast-and-single-tables-cursor2: cursor test for select a.city_id, a.city_name, b.province_id, b.province_name from t_city a, t_province b where a.province_id = b.province_id and a.city_id in (select c.city_id from t_address c, t_product d where c.address_id = d.address_id);
command.view-cursor: cursor test for select * from t_order_view;
